g.title: controls
g.text: Controls

g.title: control_2
g.text: Control 2: Inventory of Authorized and Unauthorized Software

g.title: control_3
g.text: Control 3

g.title: control_4
g.text: Control 4

g.title: control_5
g.text: Control 5

g.title: control_6
g.text: Control 6

g.title: control_8
g.text: Control 8: Malware Defenses

g.title: control_9
g.text: Control 9

g.title: control_13
g.text: Control 13: Data Protection

g.title: tmp_noexec
g.text: Ensure noexec option set on /tmp partition

g.title: var_tmp_noexec
g.text: Ensure noexec option set on /var/tmp partition

g.title: dev_shm_noexec
g.text: Ensure noexec option set on /dev/shm partition

g.title: control_3_5
g.text: Control 3.5: Use File Integrity Tools For Critical System Files

g.title: install_AIDE
g.text: Ensure AIDE is installed

g.title: integrity_check
g.text: Ensure filesystem integrity is regularly checked

g.title: prelink
g.text: Ensure prelink is disabled

g.title: control_4_5
g.text: Control 4.5: Use Automated Patch Management And Software Update Tools

g.title: config_yum
g.text: Ensure package manager repositories are configured

g.title: yum_gpg
g.text: Ensure GPG keys are configured

g.title: yum_gpg_check
g.text: Ensure gpgcheck is globally activated

g.title: yum_security_update
g.text: Ensure updates, patches, and additional security software are installed

g.title: control_5_1
g.text: Control 5.1: Minimize And Sparingly Use Administrative Privileges

g.title: bootloader_perms
g.text: Ensure permissions on bootloader config are configured

g.title: bootloader_passwd
g.text: Ensure bootloader password is set

g.title: single_user_mode_auth
g.text: Ensure authentication required for single user mode

g.title: etc_motd_perms
g.text: Ensure permissions on /etc/motd are configured

g.title: etc_issue_perms
g.text: Ensure permissions on /etc/issue are configured

g.title: etc_issuenet_perms
g.text: 1.7.1.6 Ensure permissions on /etc/issue.net are configured (Not Scored)

g.title: control_6_3
g.text: Control 6.3: Ensure Audit Logging Systems Are Not Subject To Loss (i.e. rotation/archive)

g.title: var_log_partition
g.text: Ensure separate partition exists for /var/log

g.title: var_log_audit_partition
g.text: Ensure separate partition exists for /var/log/audit

g.title: removable_media_noexec
g.text: Ensure noexec option set on removable media partitions

g.title: control_8_3
g.text: Control 8.3: Limit Use Of External Devices (i.e. USB)

g.title: control_8_4
g.text: Enable Anti-exploitation Features (i.e. DEP, ASLR, EMET)

g.title: disable_automounting
g.text: Disable Automounting

g.title: no_execute
g.text: Ensure XD/NX support is enabled

g.title: aslr
g.text: Ensure address space layout randomization (ASLR) is enabled

g.title: control_9_1
g.text: Control 9.1: Limit Open Ports, Protocols, and Services

g.title: chargen_disabled
g.text: Ensure chargen services are not enabled

g.title: daytime_disabled
g.text: Ensure daytime services are not enabled

g.title: discard_disabled
g.text: Ensure discard services are not enabled

g.title: echo_disabled
g.text: Ensure echo services are not enabled

g.title: time_disabled
g.text: Ensure time services are not enabled

g.title: tftp_disabled
g.text: Ensure tftp server is not enabled

g.title: xinetd_disabled
g.text: Ensure xinetd is not enabled

g.title: disbale_fs
g.text: Disable unused filesystems

g.title: sticky_bit
g.text: Ensure sticky bit is set on all world_writable directories

g.title: core_dump
g.text: Ensure core dumps are restricted
